title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Coldwater Spring Trail Closure  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Coldwater Spring Trail Closure  The trail that leads to the dog park from the Coldwater Spring parking lot is closed due to tree storm damage. Please avoid entering any closed area.     Information        The Mississippi River Visitor Center is Closed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, The Mississippi River Visitor Center is Closed  The Mississippi River Visitor Center, in the lobby of the Science Museum of Minnesota, is closed for remodeling with a grand reopening planned for August 25, 2016. Visitors are encouraged to visit the new St. Anthony Visitor Center at St. Anthony Falls. more
